thread.title: EventPilot® Conference App Expands Attendee Networking Opportunities At Largest Expo of HR Technology Products And Services
thread.title_full: EventPilot® Conference App Expands Attendee Networking Opportunities At Largest Expo of HR Technology Products And Services

author: Silke Fleischer
title: EventPilot® Conference App Expands Attendee Networking Opportunities At Largest Expo of HR Technology Products And Services
text:
ATIV Software announced today the HR Tech 2015 conference app, built on ATIV’s dynamic EventPilot platform, for the 18th annual HR Technology Conference and Exposition®. The app is not only designed for easy schedule building but also to simplify networking among HR professionals. EventPilot’s attendee messaging and session commenting features further facilitate the networking opportunities offered at the premier event for HR technology. Learn more at http://ativsoftware.com . “The HR Tech 2015 app reinforces the mantra of our conference as the ultimate opportunity to explore the industry’s best technology and connect with thought leaders,” said Lee Ann Tiemann, Marketing Director at LRP Publications, producers of the HR Tech Conference. “EventPilot has proven to be the best conference app to connect our attendees with session content, key conference activities, and one another.”
With the EventPilot conference app, direct user-to-user messaging makes it possible for attendees to reach out to one another before, during and after the conference to discuss findings and continue the conversation beyond the event. Additional session commenting and social media integration with Facebook and Twitter helps attendees to quickly share ideas via the app. To browse sessions and build their personal schedules via an intuitive user interface, attendees have easy login options with Facebook, Google+ or a unique login of their choosing.
About the EventPilot Meeting App
Meeting App Attendee Messaging
Attendees can stay connected and increase networking opportunities via the in-app private messenger tool.
Session Commenting
HR Tech attendees can comment on sessions within the app to expand on session content and relevant topics.
Easy Event Management
EventPilot conference apps help HR professionals to efficiently plan their attendance and stay organized during the event.
Availability
The free iPhone and iPad meeting app is available now in the App Store. The free Android event app is available in Google Play. Search “HR Technology Conference 2015” or visit http://www.hrtechconference.com/app.html . A web version is available for Windows Phones and other web-enabled devices.
About HR Technology Conference & Exposition®
HR Technology Conference & Exposition® is the annual Town Meeting of thousands of professionals from around the world who gather to share their expertise and challenges in all forms of technology for HR. In addition to senior HR practitioners, every major industry analyst, consultant, blogger and vendor regularly attends. A world-renowned event for the HR industry, the HR Tech Conference is expanding to China in 2016 to provide HR and HR IT professionals from across the APAC region with access to the thought leadership and technology solutions that can help solve their biggest challenges. The inaugural HR Technology Conference & Exposition China will take place April 13-15, 2016 in Zhuhai, China. For more information, visit http://www.hrtechnologyconference.com .
About ATIV Software
ATIV Software publishes the advanced conference app EventPilot for scientific research meetings, as well as the EventPilot Journal app for medical and scientific peer-reviewed publications. ATIV has been innovating medical and scientific meeting apps since 2010 and works with a variety of registration and abstract management vendors to enable easy data import.
